DOC.criteria: Age 4570 year BMI 2532 Waist circumference > 80 cm Postmenopausal least 1 year BP > 160/100 mmHg Fasted blood glucose > 7 mM Fasted LDLcholesterol > 6 mM Fasted triglycerides > 3 mM Diabetes mellitus chronic disease Current previous cardiovascular disease Weight change > 3 kg within last 2 month Use antihypertensive drug Use statins/fibrates Use fish oil supplement Smoking Hard physical activity > 10 h/week
